content:
Q: If you miss an exam, and have a PMC (Personal Mitigating Circumstances) you must?
A: submit a ticket via https://students.dbs.ie/dashboard/SCCM along with supporting documentation such as a medical certificate, or something equivalent. This documentation should be sent before the examination date.

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: If you miss an exam, and have a PMC (Personal Mitigating Circumstances) you must?
